title: Chicken Tikka Pizza
description: Tender, flavourful chunks of delicious tandoori chicken, on a bed of creamy cheese waiting to explode in your mouth!

title: Meatball and BBQ Pizza
description: Barbeque Chicken, Sliced Chicken Meatballs, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. The best of the West in a majestic combination. Super cheesy, super rare!
alt: Meatball and BBQ Chicken Cheese Burst Pizza

title: Kheema and Sausages Pizza
description: Chicken Tikka, Sliced Chicken Meatballs, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. East meets West in this unforgettably meaty and supremely cheesy fusion!
alt: Kheema and Sausages Cheese Burst Pizza

title: Butter Chicken Pizza
description: Chicken Chunks, Butter Chicken Gravy, Capsicum, Mozzarella Cheese. Chunks of butter chicken alongside rich creamy gravy, layered on a bed of cheesy lava!

title: Triple Chicken Pizza
description: Chicken Tikka, Sliced Chicken Meatballs, Chicken Sausages, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. Heres a peep into a chicken lovers heaven, over a bed of cheesy lava!

title: Mutton Overload Pizza
description: Mutton Chunks, Chicken Keema, Mozzarella Cheese. Mutton on a pizza? If thats tempting, imagine it with a burst of cheese!
